clusterBy :: Ord b => (a -> b) -> [a] -> [[a]]

Group list into indevidual pairs: [1,2,3,4] => [(1,2),(3,4)]. Works only with even number of elements

Undo pairs function

Group list into pairs: [1,2,3] => [(1,2),(2,3)]. Works with non null lists
